is he going to buy Bugler and and get rid of Gold and only sell the blue gross one

6 rolls of film and a Netflix envelope in the mail. Mmm.
One thing about waking up at 7:00 is that by 12:30 I've actually gotten quite a bit done. That's nice.
I want a collective of infographic designers, people to bounce ideas off of, figure out best practices of doing something. Where? Who? How?
Runnin round with eevee makes me out of breath
I feel accomplished because anytime I need to write anything down I have a moleskine for the purpose. Like 14 different ones. Big, small...
http://twitpic.com/m8p9
Don't have the patience for bullshit today.
Wishing I had a (heavy) punching bag. I'd do that shit for 0:30 every day. Could only do me good.
Home, and damned happy about it too.
Closed IRC and full-screened NeoOffice. Yeah. I'm feeling hardcore right now. Hard. Core.
My well-deserved nap became a well-deserved good-night's-sleep. I have to write an essay this morning, among other things.
Reading The Art of Deception
Reading and listening to The Mars Volta
Playing drums.
Listening to quicksilver + thinking.
Eating dinner

commits.message: fix: Set default max autosaves to 2 and clean up debug logging
refactor(projects): clean up metadata display
docs: consolidate all documentation into main README
chore(yazi): switch to light theme
chore(nvim): update LazyVim news version
feat(tmux): add tmux-menus plugin for visual TUI navigation
UI: Reorganize save menu to single column layout
CRITICAL FIX: Implement autosave cleanup (respects maxAutosaves setting)
Gate verbose autosave logs behind DEBUG_AUTOSAVE flag
Filter autosaves to current session only & add detailed logging
Add diagnostic logging to autosave for debugging
fix(tmux): move copy-mode bindings AFTER plugin init
fix(mobile): implement Maria's mobile UX fixes
CRITICAL FIX: Move useAutosave inside UiProvider to prevent crash
feat(tips): add advanced features + fix tmux copy mode
CRITICAL FIX: Actually invoke useAutosave hook
CRITICAL FIX: Remove broken CRC32 verification blocking all saves
Merge latest beta into fix/beta-tester-issues
fix: Clamp invalid money values instead of failing validation
fix(tips): add app/context prefix to every tip
refactor(tips): comprehensive rewrite with no emoji, more customizations
ci: Add manual Windows build workflow
feat(tips): bring back tips.txt with videogame loading screen vibes
chore: Remove unused diagnostic scripts
feat(zsh): add recent files across all projects fuzzy finder
style: Prettier formatting for autosave files
Perf: Use autosave selector hooks in autosaveIndicator
feat(zsh): add blazing fast Obsidian note fuzzy finder
Perf: Add autosave selector hooks to prevent unnecessary rerenders
CRITICAL: Add Windows retry logic for fs.rename() EPERM/EBUSY errors
CRITICAL: Fix Windows disk space check ENOSYS error
Add diskusage package for cross-platform disk space checking
fix(projects): restore images and improve TOC layout
Fix ultra-strict TypeScript errors in autosave system
feat(zsh): add nvim fuzzy finder aliases
ESLint auto-fix: Import ordering and formatting cleanup
fix: eliminate all unused variable linter warnings
Fix potential undefined retryDelay bug caught by ultra-strict TypeScript
Fix TypeScript strict mode errors in main.ts and test file
Fix TypeScript errors in autosave system
feat(nvim): enable virtual lines diagnostics + fix plugin issues
Integration and polish for autosave system refactor
Update save helpers and types for new Metro format
Add comprehensive SBC archive and JSON migration support
Refactor Save/Load UI components for clarity and performance
CRITICAL FIX: Autosave interval reset bug - split useEffect dependencies
Add diagnostic CLI tools for save file debugging and verification
docs: document neovim 0.11.5 upgrade
Add cross-format save manager with algorithmic performance optimizations
Refactor binary format layer with CRC32 checksums and verification
feat(nvim): show more path context in statusline
Add Zod validation schemas for save file robustness
fix: constrain inline SVG icons to 1rem to prevent growth
docs: add debugging, HTTP client, and merge conflict docs
feat(nvim): add debugging, HTTP client, and merge conflict keybindings
fix: make GitHub link touch targets mobile-only
feat(nvim,tmux): add essential daily driver plugins
feat: comprehensive mobile UX improvements for projects page
